sentence_zh_TW: 在這項比賽中，他獲得了第二名，這使他非常開心，因為這是他迄今為止的最佳成績。
sentence: In this competition, he won ______ place, which made him very happy as it was his best result so far.

sentence_zh_TW: 在每年的五月，我們都會舉行一次家庭聚會，慶祝這一年中的特殊時刻。
sentence: Every year in ______, we hold a family gathering to celebrate special moments of the year.

sentence_zh_TW: 在長時間的工作後，適當的休息能夠幫助我們更好地集中精力完成任務。
sentence: After long hours of work, taking a proper ______ can help us focus better on completing tasks.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你在會議上拒絕提出任何問題，那麼會議將可能毫無意義，因為這樣無法獲得任何有用的資料。
sentence: If you say ______ questions at the meeting, then the meeting may be pointless as no useful information can be obtained.

sentence_zh_TW: 在一天的辛苦工作後，我總是喜歡享受一次舒適的洗澡，這樣可以放鬆身心。
sentence: After a hard day's work, I always enjoy taking a relaxing ______ to soothe my body and mind.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校裡學習理財知識對於日後的生活非常重要，因為這可以幫助我們更好地管理金錢。
sentence: Learning financial literacy in school is very important for life later on, as it helps us manage our ______ better.

sentence_zh_TW: 在家庭聚會上，我的母親為我們烤了一個美味的派，大家都爭先恐後地品嚐它的美味。
sentence: At the family gathering, my mother baked a delicious ______ that everyone eagerly tasted.

sentence_zh_TW: 在經歷了很多挑戰之後，我們最後能夠完成了這個項目，大家都感到非常鬆了一口氣。
sentence: After facing many challenges, we were able to complete the project ______, and everyone felt a huge relief.

sentence_zh_TW: 在農場裡，孩子們有機會接觸各種動物，特別是可愛的兔子，增加了他們的學習樂趣。
sentence: At the farm, children get the chance to interact with different animals, especially the cute ______, which adds to their learning fun.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個箱子在搬家的時候非常有用，裡面裝滿了我們所有需要的物品。
sentence: This ______ was very helpful during the move, as it was filled with all the items we needed.

sentence_zh_TW: 這棵樹的高度超過了十米，是一個非常壯觀的景象，讓人不得不仰望。
sentence: The ______ of this tree exceeds ten meters, creating a very magnificent sight that makes people look up in awe.

sentence_zh_TW: 每週的星期三，我們都會進行一次團隊會議，來檢討過去的工作和規劃未來的任務。
sentence: Every week on ______, we hold a team meeting to review past work and plan future tasks.

sentence_zh_TW: 這台新引進的機器能夠提升生產效率，為公司節省了大量的時間和成本。
sentence: This newly introduced ______ has the potential to enhance production efficiency and save the company a lot of time and money.

sentence_zh_TW: 隨著技術進步，這家公司在其市場上的價值已飆升至川百萬的級別，引起了廣泛的關注。
sentence: With the advancement of technology, this company's market value has soared to the ______ level, attracting widespread attention.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行體育活動時，適當的保護膝蓋非常重要，以防受傷並保持良好表現。
sentence: Protecting the ______ properly during sports activities is crucial to prevent injuries and maintain good performance.

sentence_zh_TW: 當你感到生病的時候，及時就醫是很重要的，以免情況惡化，影響你的生活。
sentence: When you feel ______, it is important to seek medical attention promptly to avoid worsening the condition and affecting your daily life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在她生日那天，我給她準備了一份特別的禮物，用來表達我的心意和祝福。
sentence: On her birthday, I prepared a special ______ to express my feelings and wishes for her.

sentence_zh_TW: 在當今社會，選擇一家合適的銀行進行理財是每個人都應該注意的重要事項。
sentence: In today's society, choosing the right ______ for financial management is something everyone should pay attention to.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部電影的評價很糟糕，許多觀眾都表示十分失望，不會再去觀看了。
sentence: The reviews for this movie are ______, and many viewers express their disappointment and will not watch it again.

sentence_zh_TW: 健康飲食中應包含各種食物，而豆子因其高纖維和蛋白質含量尤其重要。
sentence: A healthy diet should include various foods, and ______ are especially important due to their high fiber and protein content.
